column1: A certain college girl who’s loved books ever since she was a little  girl dies in an accident and is reborn in
another world she knows  nothing about. She is now Myne
column2: the sickly five-year-old daughter of a  poor
the world she’s been reborn in has a very low literacy rate and books mostly

column1: don’t exist. She’d have to pay  an enormous amount of money to buy one.
Myne resolves herself: If there aren’t any books
column2: she’ll just have to make them! Her goal is to become a

column1: librarian. This story begins with  her quest to make books so she can live surrounded by them!
